VoiceList.Entry: Aeris “Cloud!!”
Barret “Hey!! Cloud!!”
Tifa “Hey,Cloud!”
Red XIII “Cloud! What's wrong!”
Yuffie “Cloud! What are you doing?”
Cait Sith “Cloud! What's wrong with you!?”
Cid “What the hell is going on!”
Vincent “What are you doing?”
Cloud “Ha ha ha… Black Materia.”
Cloud “Ha ha ha… Call Meteor.”
Aeris “Cloud!! Get a hold of yourself!”
Cloud “Cloud…”
“I'm… Cloud…”
Cloud “How should I?”
Cloud “…I remember! I remember my way.”
Aeris “…Cloud.”
Cloud “Mm? What's wrong? Is something wrong?”
Aeris “…It's nothing so don't worry about it.”
Aeris “Right,Cloud! It's nothing.”
Aeris “Sephiroth got away.”
Cloud “…Don't worry about it. I understood what he was saying.”
Cloud “So this must be Meteor,right?”
Barret “Is it some sort of a disaster?”
“It looks like something's gonna fall from the sky.”
Tifa “Is something going to fall from the sky?”
Red XIII “Something's going to fall down?”
Cait Sith Then,we got trouble." “Oh,so something's going to fall from the sky? It's going to be something big.”
Vincent “Something huge is falling from the sky?”
Yuffie “I don't know what it is but…”
“It looks like it's going to make a mess…”
Cid “I don't know what the hell it is but it's falling from the sky?”
“Hmpf! It's not even an omen.”
Aeris “…This must be magic. Just what Sephiroth was saying.”
Aeris “The Ultimate Destructive Magic,Meteor.”
“It finds small drifting planets with its magic.”
Aeris “And then collides with them. This Planet might get wiped out entirely…”
Cloud “Sephiroth!?”
Sephiroth “Ha ha ha… It is not me.”
Sephiroth “Ha ha ha… You should know…”
Cloud “Any sign of Sephiroth?”
Aeris “He disappeared.”
Cloud “We're locked in.”
Cait Sith “She told me to 'Be strong.' I feel so happy.”
Cait Sith “Owwww…”
Cait Sith “What happened?”
Cait Sith “I can still move more.”
Cait Sith “The Ancients went out of their way to make this great machine.”
Cait Sith “I'm saving this Planet too! I'm a little embarrassed…”
Cait Sith “This must be it!”
